name: UpdateFileManagerFile
description:
Update a file in the Mailchimp File Manager.

Use this tool to update an existing file in Mailchimp's File Manager by providing the file ID. It is useful for changing file details or replacing content.

parameters.name: file_manager_file_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the File Manager file to be updated.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the File Manager file.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: The ID of the folder. Set to `0` to remove a file from its current folder.

value_schema.description: The id of the folder. Setting `folder_id` to `0` will remove a file from its current folder.

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: Specify the new name for the file in the File Manager.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: file_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the File Manager file.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the File Manager file.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: The id of the folder. Setting `folder_id` to `0` will remove a file from its current folder.

value_schema.description: The id of the folder. Setting `folder_id` to `0` will remove a file from its current folder.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
